ValidationRule.description: Only Senior Deputies can Close a case = BOFE
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Closed"), NOT($Permission.BOFE_Senior_Deputy), NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') ), LEFT( RecordType.Name , 4) = 'BOFE' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only a Senior Deputy can close a BOFE case.
